column1: The '''Hall of Fire''' was a large room in [[Elrond]]'s house in [[Rivendell]].  Between carven pillars in a great hearth a fire was always kept lit, with little other light present.  While the hall stood empty during most days, at night it was given over to the telling of tales and singing of songs.

column2: Ring]] and was saddened to see Frodo's negative reaction.  The two hobbits then enjoyed talking about [[the Shire]] until [[Aragorn]] came and helped Bilbo polish his poem.
